import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import InputText from '../../../components/Input/InputText' import ErrorText from '../../../components/Typography/ErrorText' import Printer from '@heroicons/react/24/outline/PrinterIcon' import { CUSTOMERDATA } from "../../people/customer/index"; import { showNotification } from "../../common/headerSlice" import { deletePayment, editPayment, getPaymentsContent } from "../pos/paymentSlice"; function InvoiceModalBodyPayment({closeModal, customerId}){ const [paymentObj, setPaymentObj] = useState(null); const [errorMessage, setErrorMessage] = useState(""); const printPage = () => { window.print(); }; useEffect(() => { const payment = CUSTOMERDATA.find((c) => c.id === customerId); if (payment) { setPaymentObj(payment); } else { setErrorMessage("Payment not found."); } }, [customerId]); if (!paymentObj) { return

Loading...

; } return( <>
{/* Info */}

{paymentObj.code}

{paymentObj.address}

{paymentObj.name}

{paymentObj.phone}

{/* Order Detail */}

{paymentObj.name}

{paymentObj.tax}

{paymentObj.returnSales}

{paymentObj.name} {paymentObj.totalSales} {paymentObj.returnSales}

Thank You For Shopping With Us.

{errorMessage && {errorMessage}}
) } export default InvoiceModalBodyPayment
